EASTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
MAURITANIA.
DNC 01.
1. HAZARDOUS OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 31 DEC 23
   IN AREA BOUND BY
   16-03.90N 016-37.30W, 16-06.80N 016-35.40W,
   16-06.90N 016-35.20W, 16-04.10N 016-34.80W,
   16-02.80N 016-35.90W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 010001Z JAN 24.
